cause.description:
Donate bluetooth headsets to homeless and unfortunate insane people who talk to themselves.
If we get these people bluetooth headsets they will appear to be on the phone instead of talking to themselves. This will allow them to function in society.
1. Allow those who talk to themselves appear to be normal in a public environment.
cause.mission: Allow homeless and people who talk to themselves to function in the world.
cause.name: Donate Bluetooth headsets to homeless people who talk to themselves.
